name: ThereforIAm
description:
Play as a robot in a post-apocalyptic world to uncover the secrets of your lost creators. Explore the wreckage of the old A.I.D building and Hack your way through security systems to discover what really happened to the remains of the world around you and discover yourself along the way.

This game was created by students of the Art Institutes of Austin, Houston, And Dallas

Please let us know if you enjoyed you're experience with ThereforeIAm
